testcase.name: User fills the in an improper way
testcase.system-out: Given the browser is opened.................................................passed And the user is in the home page............................................passed Given the user navigates to the contact form page...........................passed And does not fill all text fields properly..................................passed When the user clicks the submit button......................................passed Then then the "error" message "There is 1 error" is displayed to the customer.passed
